summary: Emil visit the market in Vimmerby, take part in the yearly religious examination and save Alfred from dying in a snow storm.
cast: Jan Ohlsson|Lena Wisborg|Allan Edwall|Emy Storm|Björn Gustafson|Maud Hansson|Carsta Löck|Hannelore Schroth|Georg Årlin|Bertil Norström|Paul Esser|Rudolf Schündler|Stefan Grybe|Kristina Jämtmark|Astrid Lindgren|Isa Quensel
title: Nya hyss av Emil i Lönneberga
